attributes.action: ; having regard to our saying that the British people, facing a range of changing and serious threats, both man made and natural, such as bird flu, terrorism, global warming and nuclear proliferation; need a Government that is competent and honest, will always act at home and overseas only in the interests of the British people as a whole and place the British people’s interests above those of its ministers and party; and that the present Government manifestly does not meet these needs; just go at once, with all your ministers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
